doc:
Wayne Froman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wayne_Froman 0 Wayne Froman was an American actor who worked extensively in Australia, in particularly on radio. He also appeared on stage and in the film South West Pacific. He had worked as a comedian in New York when he arrived in Australia in late 1939 to appear in Ziegfeld Follies.In July 1945 he, along with a number of other actors, was banned for three months from radio for broadcasting "objectionable matter". Wayne_Froman was an_American_actor who worked extensively in Australia , in particularly on radio . He also appeared on stage and in the_film South_West_Pacific . He had_worked as a_comedian in New_York when he arrived in Australia in late_1939 to_appear in Ziegfeld_Follies.In_July_1945 he , along with a_number of other_actors , was_banned for three_months from radio for broadcasting " objectionable_matter_" .
